## Text + Image Section

### Highlight Your Main Feature Here

This component is designed to showcase a core feature, service, or concept using a compelling image on one side and descriptive text on the other. It is an ideal layout for explaining your value proposition clearly and succinctly.

> The image should visually represent the content of this text block. You can easily switch the layout to place the image on the left or the right side, adjusting the flow to best suit your narrative.

- - -

### Key Takeaway Points:

* **Clarity:** Use this space to drive home a single, strong message.
* **Visual Impact:** Ensure your image is high-quality and directly relevant.
* **Flexibility:** Easily adjust the content layout in the CMS.
